text: Kageneckia is a genus of flowering plant in family Rosaceae. ==Taxonomic history== Kageneckia, along with Vauquelinia and Lindleya were formerly placed in family Quillajaceae. It shares a base chromosome number of 17 with the pome-fruited members of tribe Maleae within the Rosaceae, but its fruit are dry and dehiscent. ==Species== Species include: * Kageneckia angustifolia, D. Don * Kageneckia lanceolata, Ruiz & Pav. * Kageneckia oblonga, Ruiz & Pav. ==References== Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Rosaceae genera
title: Kageneckia
